mapper.select: INSERT INTO content_state(content_uuid, tmdb_id, state) VALUES (#{dto.contentUuid}, #{dto.tmdbId}, #{dto.state}) RETURNING id
mapper.update: UPDATE content_state SET state = COALESCE(#{dto.state}, state), progress = COALESCE(#{dto.progress}, progress), error_cause = COALESCE(#{dto.errorCause}, error_cause), updated_at = NOW() WHERE content_uuid = #{dto.contentUuid}
